short_summary: Supply and delivery of fertilizer bander.
description: The agricultural department needs a fertilizer bander to be supplied and delivered to their research plots.
full_summary:
# 01586-230200 - Fertilizer Bander Solicitation

**Reference:** WS4508453182-Doc4510137490
**Category:** Goods and Services
**Sector:** Agriculture
**Type:** Request for Proposal

**Key Dates:**

* **Publication Date:** April 10, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 1, 2024 at 14:00:00 EST (Note: The initial deadline has been extended)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 31, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** May 9, 2025

**Goods or Services:**

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites proposals for the supply and delivery of one (1) Fertilizer Bander for sub-surface placement of prilled/granular materials in annual small grain crops.

The Fertilizer Bander will be used in research plots where it is advantageous to band fertilizer independently of (typically before) the seeding operation. The bidder must provide the necessary documentation to demonstrate the ability to meet the technical specifications and requirements outlined in the solicitation.

**Technical Specifications:**

* UNSPSC Code: 21101500
* Category: Agricultural Machinery for Soil Preparation
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Countries of Opportunity: None

**Eligibility Criteria:**

* Bidders must be able to supply the goods or services in a timely manner.
* Bidders must provide a detailed description of their proposal, including technical specifications, prices, and delivery schedules.

**Proposer Contact:**

* Name: Douglas Rachinski
* Title: [Title]
* Email: [douglas.rachinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:douglas.rachinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact Address: None provided

**RFP Details:**

* E-Procurement ID: None
* Tender Description: Amendment to Closing Time - Refer to tender documentation.
* Attachment: None

The RFP documents can be accessed through the [Canada Business Network](https://www.canadabusiness.ca/en) website.

**Important Note:**

Please be advised that the initial deadline has been extended. Proposals submitted after 14:00:00 EST on May 1, 2024, will be considered non-responsive. It is the bidder's responsibility to ensure that all required documentation is submitted by the new deadline. Please
